opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Vickers v. Dretke, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Correctional Institutions Division

opinion:
540 U.S. 1086

VICKERS
v.
DRETKE, DIRECTOR, TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF CRIMINAL JUSTICE, CORRECTIONAL INSTITUTIONS DIVISION.

No. 03-7127 (03A448).

Supreme Court of United States.

December 9, 2003.

1

Appeal from the C. A. 5th Cir.

2

Application for stay of execution of sentence of death, presented to JUSTICE SCALIA, and by him referred to the Court, denied.
